verses.text: \w When|strong="H3588"\w* thou shalt \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w eat|strong="H3898"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* prince, \w consider|strong="H0995"\w* \w diligently|strong="H0995"\w* \w what|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w set|strong="H3427"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5315"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w a|strong="H7760"\w* \w knife|strong="H7915"\w* \w to|strong="H5315"\w* thy \w throat|strong="H5315"\w*, \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w be|strong="H5315"\w* \w so|strong="H7760"\w* \w that|strong="H5315"\w* thou \w have|strong="H0859"\w* thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w in|strong="H5315"\w* thy \w own|strong="H5315"\w* power.

\w Be|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* desirous \w of|strong="H3899"\w* \w his|strong="H1931"\w* meats, \w in|strong="H3899"\w* \w which|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H0408"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w of|strong="H3899"\w* deceit.
Labour \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w to|strong="H2308"\w* \w be|strong="H0408"\w* \w rich|strong="H6238"\w*: but set bounds \w to|strong="H2308"\w* thy prudence.

Lift \w not|strong="H0369"\w* up thy \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w to|strong="H0369"\w* riches \w which|strong="H5869"\w* thou canst \w not|strong="H0369"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H0369"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* themselves \w wings|strong="H3671"\w* \w like|strong="H8064"\w* \w those|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w an|strong="H3588"\w* \w eagle|strong="H5404"\w*, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w shall|strong="H0369"\w* \w fly|strong="H5774"\w* towards \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*.

\w Eat|strong="H3898"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w with|strong="H3899"\w* an envious man, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w desire|strong="H0183"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w his|strong="H0183"\w* meats:

\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w like|strong="H3644"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* soothsayer, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* diviner, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* thinketh \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w which|strong="H1931"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* knoweth \w not|strong="H3588"\w*. \w Eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*, \w will|strong="H3820"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* thee: \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w mind|strong="H3820"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* thee.

\w The|strong="H0398"\w* meats \w which|strong="H1697"\w* thou hadst \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w*, thou shalt \w vomit|strong="H6958"\w* \w up|strong="H0398"\w*: \w and|strong="H0398"\w* shalt loose thy beautiful \w words|strong="H1697"\w*.

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w in|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* \w of|strong="H0241"\w* \w fools|strong="H3684"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H0241"\w* \w despise|strong="H0936"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* instruction \w of|strong="H0241"\w* thy \w speech|strong="H4405"\w*.

Touch \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* bounds \w of|strong="H1366"\w* little ones: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w of|strong="H1366"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w*:

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w near|strong="H0854"\w* \w kinsman|strong="H1350"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w strong|strong="H2389"\w*: \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H1931"\w* \w judge|strong="H7378"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w cause|strong="H7379"\w* \w against|strong="H0854"\w* thee.

Let thy \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w apply|strong="H0935"\w* itself \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w instruction|strong="H4148"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* thy \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w words|strong="H0561"\w* \w of|strong="H3820"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*.

\w Withhold|strong="H4513"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w correction|strong="H4148"\w* \w from|strong="H4513"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w child|strong="H5288"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* thou \w strike|strong="H5221"\w* \w him|strong="H5221"\w* \w with|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w rod|strong="H7626"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.

Thou shalt \w beat|strong="H5221"\w* \w him|strong="H5221"\w* \w with|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w rod|strong="H7626"\w*, \w and|strong="H5315"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \w his|strong="H5221"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w from|strong="H5315"\w* hell.

\w My|strong="H0518"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w if|strong="H0518"\w* thy \w mind|strong="H3820"\w* \w be|strong="H1571"\w* \w wise|strong="H2449"\w*, \w my|strong="H0518"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* \w with|strong="H1571"\w* thee:

\w And|strong="H1696"\w* \w my|strong="H1696"\w* reins shall \w rejoice|strong="H5937"\w*, \w when|strong="H1696"\w* thy \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* shall \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w what|strong="H4339"\w* \w is|strong="H1696"\w* \w right|strong="H4339"\w*.

\w Let|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* thy \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w envy|strong="H7065"\w* \w sinners|strong="H2400"\w*: \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H0408"\w* thou \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fear|strong="H3374"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w long|strong="H3117"\w*:

\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* thou shalt \w have|strong="H3426"\w* \w hope|strong="H8615"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w latter|strong="H0319"\w* \w end|strong="H0319"\w*, \w and|strong="H3772"\w* thy expectation \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* taken away.

\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* thou, \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w wise|strong="H2449"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w guide|strong="H0833"\w* thy \w mind|strong="H3820"\w* \w in|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*.

\w Be|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w in|strong="H1320"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* feasts \w of|strong="H1320"\w* great drinkers, \w nor|strong="H0408"\w* \w in|strong="H1320"\w* \w their|strong="H1961"\w* revellings, who contribute \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* eat:

\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* give themselves \w to|strong="H3588"\w* drinking, \w and|strong="H3423"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* club together shall \w be|strong="H3588"\w* consumed; \w and|strong="H3423"\w* \w drowsiness|strong="H5124"\w* shall \w be|strong="H3588"\w* \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* \w with|strong="H3847"\w* \w rags|strong="H7168"\w*.

Hearken \w to|strong="H8085"\w* thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w beget|strong="H3205"\w* thee: \w and|strong="H0001"\w* \w despise|strong="H0936"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* thy \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w old|strong="H2204"\w*.

\w Buy|strong="H7069"\w* \w truth|strong="H0571"\w*, \w and|strong="H2451"\w* \w do|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w sell|strong="H4376"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*, \w and|strong="H2451"\w* \w instruction|strong="H4148"\w*, \w and|strong="H2451"\w* \w understanding|strong="H0998"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3205"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w of|strong="H3205"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w just|strong="H6662"\w* rejoiceth \w greatly|strong="H1523"\w*: \w he|strong="H0001"\w* \w that|strong="H0001"\w* hath \w begotten|strong="H3205"\w* \w a|strong="H3205"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w son|strong="H2450"\w*, \w shall|strong="H0001"\w* \w have|strong="H0001"\w* \w joy|strong="H8055"\w* \w in|strong="H0001"\w* \w him|strong="H3205"\w*.

\w Let|strong="H1523"\w* thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, \w and|strong="H0001"\w* thy \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* \w be|strong="H0517"\w* \w joyful|strong="H8055"\w*, \w and|strong="H0001"\w* \w let|strong="H1523"\w* \w her|strong="H3205"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* \w that|strong="H0001"\w* \w bore|strong="H3205"\w* thee.

\w My|strong="H5414"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* thy \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w let|strong="H5414"\w* thy \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* keep \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w* \w is|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w deep|strong="H6013"\w* ditch: \w and|strong="H0875"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* strange \w woman|strong="H5237"\w* \w is|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* narrow \w pit|strong="H7745"\w*.

\w She|strong="H1931"\w* lieth \w in|strong="H0693"\w* \w wait|strong="H0693"\w* \w in|strong="H0693"\w* \w the|strong="H3254"\w* way \w as|strong="H3254"\w* \w a|strong="H1931"\w* \w robber|strong="H2863"\w*, \w and|strong="H0120"\w* \w him|strong="H1931"\w* whom \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* see unwary, \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H0120"\w* kill.

\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* hath \w woe|strong="H0188"\w*? \w whose|strong="H4310"\w* father hath \w woe|strong="H0188"\w*? \w who|strong="H4310"\w* hath \w contentions|strong="H4066"\w*? \w who|strong="H4310"\w* falls into pits? \w who|strong="H4310"\w* hath \w wounds|strong="H6482"\w* \w without|strong="H2600"\w* \w cause|strong="H2600"\w*? \w who|strong="H4310"\w* hath \w redness|strong="H2448"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*?

\w Surely|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3196"\w* \w pass|strong="H0935"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* time \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* study \w to|strong="H0935"\w* drink \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* cups.

\w Look|strong="H7200"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w upon|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w is|strong="H5869"\w* yellow, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* colour thereof shineth \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* glass: \w it|strong="H5414"\w* goeth \w in|strong="H1980"\w* pleasantly,

But in \w the|strong="H0319"\w* \w end|strong="H0319"\w*, \w it|strong="H0319"\w* \w will|strong="H0319"\w* bite like a \w snake|strong="H5175"\w*, \w and|strong="H5175"\w* \w will|strong="H0319"\w* spread abroad poison like a basilisk.

Thy \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w shall|strong="H3820"\w* \w behold|strong="H7200"\w* \w strange|strong="H2114"\w* women, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* thy \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w shall|strong="H3820"\w* \w utter|strong="H1696"\w* \w perverse|strong="H8419"\w* \w things|strong="H8419"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7218"\w* thou shalt \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w one|strong="H1961"\w* sleeping \w in|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w midst|strong="H3820"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* pilot fast asleep, \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* stern \w is|strong="H3820"\w* lost.

\w And|strong="H3045"\w* thou shalt \w say|strong="H3254"\w*: \w They|strong="H5221"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w beaten|strong="H5221"\w* \w me|strong="H3254"\w*, \w but|strong="H5221"\w* \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w was|strong="H5221"\w* \w not|strong="H3254"\w* sensible \w of|strong="H3045"\w* pain: \w they|strong="H5221"\w* drew \w me|strong="H3254"\w*, \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w I|strong="H3045"\w* felt \w not|strong="H3254"\w*: \w when|strong="H4970"\w* \w shall|strong="H3045"\w* \w I|strong="H3045"\w* awake, \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w find|strong="H3045"\w* wine \w again|strong="H5750"\w*?
